name: Carbine Conversion Kit
effect: The weapon gains Inaccurate, Threat 3, and is also considered a CQB weapon. This mod cannot be applied to weapons that already have Inaccurate.
description: Cut down barrels, foregrips, laser sights, and bullpup configurations are some of the many modifications used by IPS-N marine pilots to turn a full sized Rifle into a Carbine, trading some of its long range capability for superior handling in tight corridors.

added_tags.name: INACCURATE
added_tags.description: Attacks made with this weapon receive +1 Difficulty.

name: Unbalancing Blow
effect:
This weapon gains On Crit: Knockback 1
Whenever you inflict Knockback X with this weapon, you may spend a charge to instead force the enemy to make a Hull Check with -X to the roll. On a failure, they are knocked Prone.
description: Advanced computing subroutines can almost-instantaneously locate a hostile’s center of gravity, and direct powerful attacks to unbalance this fragile equilibrium.

tags.name: LIMITED {VAL}
tags.description: This weapon or system can only be used {VAL} times before it requires a Full Repair. Some Limited systems, like Grenades, describe these uses as “charges”. To use the system, the user expends a charge.

name: Rocket Attachment
effect: 1/round, when you attack with this weapon, you may take Heat depending on the weapon’s size (Main/aux: 1, Heavy: 2, Superheavy: 3) to fly up to 3 spaces directly towards the targeted character before the attack. This movement ignores engagement and doesn’t provoke reactions.
description: The spare rocket thrusters that comes with the Brudenell’s Standard Repair Kit have a habit of going missing, only to later resurface strapped to an oversized melee weapon by an enterprising pilot.

tags.name: UNIQUE
tags.description: This weapon or system cannot be duplicated – each character can only have one copy of it installed at a time.

name: Autonomous Edge Alignment
effect: On Attack: The weapon gains Reliable equal to the value of its final Accuracy dice, if it applies. If it already has Reliable, use whichever is higher.
description: Harrison Armoy EDGEMASTR combines state of the art probability and spatial mapping to bring you the finest in bladed weapon accessory. With a rugged AI unit integrated in the hilt unit and an autonomously controlled gyroscope housed inside the blade, there’s no such thing as a glancing blow with the EDGEMASTR, for every strike you make will strike true with mathematical precision.

tags.name: UNIQUE
tags.description: This weapon or system cannot be duplicated – each character can only have one copy of it installed at a time.

name: MK3 Beam Diffuser
effect:
Choose a ranged weapon that does energy damage and does not have Cone, Burst or Blast. That weapon gains Heat 2 (self) and changes its template to Cone, depending on its original range/line. If it has both Range and Line, the Line takes precedence, and is the part that is converted.
  • Range 0-10/Line 0-5: Cone 3
  • Range 11-20/Line 6-10: Cone 5
  • Range>20/Line >10: Cone 7
description: Utilizing a diffusing crystal mounted upon the muzzle, the MK3 Beam Diffuser can be calibrated to split a single beam of energy into a dizzying fusillade of beams blanketing a wide area. Though powerful, it remains in the prototype phase, due to the attachment's reliance on a rare crystal to withstand the energy output of most mil-spec energy weapons, as well as the attachment’s propensity to melt itself through heavy usage.

added_tags.name: HEAT {VAL} (SELF)
added_tags.description: Immediately after using this weapon or system, the user takes {VAL} Heat.
